tool_description: This Api returns the current time in multiple timezones. the API returns the current time in UTC, UTC-4, UTC+2, and UTC+8 timezones in a JSON format. The API response includes the timezone name and the corresponding time in the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS. This API can be useful for displaying the current time in multiple timezones on a website or for a variety of other time-related applications.
name: World Clock Timezones
title: World Clock Timezones

api_list.name: timezones
api_list.description: The API should return a JSON response with the current time in UTC, UTC-4, UTC+2, and UTC+8 time zones.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-clock-timezones.p.rapidapi.com/timezones"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-clock-timezones.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://world-clock-timezones.p.rapidapi.com/timezones"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-clock-timezones.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
